Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx

package io.github.zero88.schedulerx
The scheduler.x core API
  • Related Packages

    Description
    io.github.zero88.schedulerx.impl
    The scheduler.x internal implementation.
    io.github.zero88.schedulerx.mutiny
     
    io.github.zero88.schedulerx.rxjava3
     
    io.github.zero88.schedulerx.trigger
    Provides the classes and interfaces to define the trigger and its executor.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    JobData
    Represents for input task data
    Task
    Represents for Task to run on each trigger time
    TaskExecutionContext
    Represents for a context per each execution round
    TaskExecutor
    Represents for an executor run task in conditional loop
    TaskExecutorLogMonitor
    Represents for a log monitor that observes and do log on each lifecycle event of the task executor.
    TaskExecutorMonitor
    Represents for a monitor that watches lifecycle event in executor.
    TaskExecutorProperties
    Shared immutable fields between TaskExecutor and its builder
    TaskExecutorState
    Represents for current Task executor state
    TaskResult
    Represents for task result will be pass on each event of TaskExecutorMonitor
    TriggerTaskExecutor<T extends Trigger>
    Represents for an executor run task based on particular trigger
    TriggerTaskExecutorBuilder<TRIGGER extends Trigger,EXECUTOR extends TriggerTaskExecutor<TRIGGER>,SELF extends TriggerTaskExecutorBuilder<TRIGGER,EXECUTOR,SELF>>
    Represents for the high level of a builder that construct TriggerTaskExecutor
